questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a corrupt government agency on an island known for its judicial powers. What is...?
Taking place on a ship graveyard, this arc introduces the character of Brook and the concept of the Florian Triangle. What is...?
Set in the dangerous New World, this arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' alliance with the Heart Pirates to take down one of the Four Emperors. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to transform into a dragon or a dragon-like creature. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu

questions.question: This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This character, known for their skeletal appearance and musical talents, is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
